data.title: Salvini: "The stretch of road we will travel with Vannacci is approved by Northern League members and others"
data.meta_description: Salvini: "The stretch of road we will travel with Vannacci is approved by Northern League members and others" Read all the latest news on Agenzia Nova
data.text:
“If Roberto Vannacci approaches half a million preferences, it means that the stretch of road we will travel together is approved by both Northern League members and non-League members”. The secretary of the League and vice prime minister said it Matteo Salvini in the press room in via Bellerio commenting on the electoral results of the European elections.

“If we are even at 0, there is satisfaction over policies. The air in Europe is absolutely positive” she added. “From north to south, those who were doubtful about nominating Vannacci have had a response from the people” said Salvini who declared that he had “complimented Marine Le Pen and I messaged with george, I complimented her."

Read also other news on Nova News
